overview: Chris Jericho attempts to save us from WWE Champion Randy Orton. The war between Batista and Undertaker escalates with a new combatant, Edge, in the picture and any friendship that existed between Triple H and Jeff Hardy vanishes when they clash for a title shot.  Armageddon arrives for the Superstars of Raw, Smackdown and ECW.
tagline: The Most Devastating Wars Are Fought Over Championship Gold.
title: WWE Armageddon 2007
